root = self.parent

customMethods.name: setTableData
customMethods.script:
tbl = self.getChild("Table")

	bedsPerRow = 10
	
	try:
	
		bedList = self.getBedListDb(dateIn,facilityId)
		
		bedList = self.correctRooms(bedList, ['Apartments','Vine Hill'])
		
		matrix = self.getMatrix(bedList,bedsPerRow)
		
		matrixWide = self.getMatrixWide(matrix)

		self.setColumns(tbl, matrixWide)
		#self.setDataProps(tbl, matrixWide)	
		tbl.props.data = self.getDataProps(matrixWide)

	except:
		import traceback
		tbf = traceback.format_exc()
		system.perspective.print(('Custom Error Message:',tbf))

customMethods.name: setTableDataInit
customMethods.script:
tbl = self.getChild("Table")
	
	bedsPerRow = 5

	bedList = self.getBedListDb(dateIn,facilityId)
	matrix = self.getMatrix(bedList,bedsPerRow)
	matrixWide = self.getMatrixWide(matrix)

	self.setColumns(tbl, matrixWide)

	data0 = self.getDataPropsInit(matrixWide)
	
	tbl.custom.dataZ = None
	tbl.props.data = data0

customMethods.name: setColumns
customMethods.script:
segmentCount = len(matrixWide)
	colNames = ['x{}'.format(i) for i in range(segmentCount)]	
	
	fields = colNames
	headerTitles = colNames
	colCount = len(colNames)
	
	widths = colCount*[410] #210
	justify = colCount*['center']
	
	jsonAtom = """{
	  "visible": true,
	  "resizable": true,
	  "dateFormat": "MM/DD/YYYY",
	  "footer": {
	    "justify": "left",
	    "style": { "classes": "" },
	    "title": "",
	    "align": "center"
	  },
	  "editable": true,
	  "sortable": true,
	  "sort": "none",
	  "align": "center",
	  "viewPath": "",
	  "number": "value",
	  "boolean": "checkbox",
	  "strictWidth": false,
	  "field": "bedId",
	  "numberFormat": "0,0.##",
	  "justify": "auto",
	  "progressBar": {
	    "bar": { "color": "", "style": { "classes": "" } },
	    "min": 0,
	    "max": 100,
	    "track": { "color": "", "style": { "classes": "" } },
	    "value": {
	      "justify": "center",
	      "format": "0,0.##",
	      "style": { "classes": "" },
	      "enabled": true
	    }
	  },
	  "width": "",
	  "header": {
	    "justify": "left",
	    "style": { "classes": "" },
	    "title": "",
	    "align": "center"
	  },
	  "toggleSwitch": { "color": { "unselected": "", "selected": "" } },
	  "style": {},
	  "viewParams": {},
	  "render": "auto"
	}"""
	
	pyList = []
	lstCol = []
	for i in range(colCount):
		pyAtom = system.util.jsonDecode(jsonAtom)
		pyAtom['field'] = fields[i]
		pyAtom['sortable'] = False
		pyAtom['editable'] = False
		pyAtom['strictWidth'] = True
		pyAtom['width'] = widths[i]
		#pyAtom['justify'] = justify[i]
		pyAtom['header']['title'] = headerTitles[i]
		#pyAtom['header']['justify'] = justify[i]
		#pyAtom['header']['style']['classes'] = 'Table/Column_Header_Detail_Small' #'Table/Column_Header_Detail'
		
		pyAtom['render'] = 'view'
		pyAtom['viewPath'] = "Shelter/Schedule/PreviewForDashboard/Cards/Cell_TenLabels" 
		
		pyList.append(pyAtom)
		
	tbl.props.columns = pyList

customMethods.name: getMatrix
customMethods.script:
import operator
	import itertools

	bedsPerRow = 10

	bedList = sorted(bedList, key=operator.itemgetter("facilityName","roomName","bedNameNo"))
	
	frbList = []	
	for i,g in itertools.groupby(bedList,key= operator.itemgetter("facilityName")): 
		_lstG = list(g)
		_lstRb = []
		for j, h in itertools.groupby(_lstG,key= operator.itemgetter("roomName")):
			_lstRb.append(list(h))
		
		frbList.append(_lstRb)
	
	#addEmpyBeforeFacility = True
	addEmpyBeforeFacility = True
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('frbList:',frbList))
	
	# Create matrix as list with item as: facility(list) or room(list) or bed(list)
	matrix = []
	i = 0
	facilitiesIndex, roomsIndex = [], []
	for _f in frbList:
		# Add [None,None,...None] before facility name
		#if addEmpyBeforeFacility and i != 0:
			#_oneRow = bedsPerRow*[None]
			#matrix.append(_oneRow)
			#i += 1	
			
		#_oneRow = [{'facilityId': _f[0][0]['facilityId'], 'facilityName':_f[0][0]['facilityName']}] + (bedsPerRow - 1)*[None]
		#matrix.append(_oneRow)
		#facilitiesIndex.append(i)
		#i += 1
		
		# Loop rooms in facility
		for _r in _f:
			_oneRow = [{'roomId': _r[0]['roomId'], 'roomName':_r[0]['roomName']}] + (bedsPerRow - 1)*[None] 
			matrix.append(_oneRow)
			roomsIndex.append(i)
			i += 1
			
			# Take only bed data, avoid facility room data
			_rPop = [{'bedId':x['bedId'],'bedState':x['bedState'], 'bedName': x['bedName'], 'bedNameNo': x['bedNameNo']} for x in _r]
			roomSquared = self.getRoomSquared(_rPop, bedsPerRow)

			for x in roomSquared:
				matrix.append(x)
				i += 1
	#ystem.perspective.print(('matrix:',matrix))
	
	return matrix


	"""	
	Examples: 
	
matrix = 
[
	...

	[

	    None,

customMethods.name: XgetMatrix
customMethods.script:
import operator
	import itertools

	bedsPerRow = 10

	bedList = sorted(bedList, key=operator.itemgetter("facilityName","roomName","bedNameNo"))
	
	frbList = []	
	for i,g in itertools.groupby(bedList,key= operator.itemgetter("facilityName")): 
		_lstG = list(g)
		_lstRb = []
		for j, h in itertools.groupby(_lstG,key= operator.itemgetter("roomName")):
			_lstRb.append(list(h))
		
		frbList.append(_lstRb)
	
	#addEmpyBeforeFacility = True
	addEmpyBeforeFacility = True
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('frbList:',frbList))
	
	# Create matrix as list with item as: facility(list) or room(list) or bed(list)
	matrix = []
	i = 0
	facilitiesIndex, roomsIndex = [], []
	for _f in frbList:
		# Add [None,None,...None] before facility name
		if addEmpyBeforeFacility and i != 0:
			_oneRow = bedsPerRow*[None]
			matrix.append(_oneRow)
			i += 1	
			
		_oneRow = [{'facilityId': _f[0][0]['facilityId'], 'facilityName':_f[0][0]['facilityName']}] + (bedsPerRow - 1)*[None]
		matrix.append(_oneRow)
		facilitiesIndex.append(i)
		i += 1
		
		# Loop rooms in facility
		for _r in _f:
			_oneRow = [{'roomId': _r[0]['roomId'], 'roomName':_r[0]['roomName']}] + (bedsPerRow - 1)*[None] 
			matrix.append(_oneRow)
			roomsIndex.append(i)
			i += 1
			
			# Take only bed data, avoid facility room data
			_rPop = [{'bedId':x['bedId'],'bedState':x['bedState'], 'bedName': x['bedName'], 'bedNameNo': x['bedNameNo']} for x in _r]
			roomSquared = self.getRoomSquared(_rPop, bedsPerRow)

			for x in roomSquared:
				matrix.append(x)
				i += 1
	system.perspective.print(('matrix:',matrix))
	
	return matrix


	"""	
	Examples: 
	
matrix = 
[
	...
	
    [{"roomId": 76, "roomName": u"Room 9"}, None, None, None, None],
	[
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 189, "bedName": u"Bed 1", "bedNameNo": 1},

customMethods.name: getMatrixWide
customMethods.script:
bedsPerRow = len(matrix[0]) 	#5
	requiredSegments = 1  			#7
	approxRowQty = int(len(matrix) / float(requiredSegments))

	
	facilitiesIndex, roomsIndex = [], []
	i = 0
	for item in matrix:
		if item[0]:
			_auxF = item[0].get('facilityId', False)
			if _auxF:
				facilitiesIndex.append(i)
			else:
				_auxR = item[0].get('roomId', False)
				if _auxR:
					roomsIndex.append(i)
			
		i += 1

		
	matrixWide = [[]]
	segment = 0
	okToAddSegment = True
	i = 0
	for _m in matrix:
	
		if (i in facilitiesIndex) or ((i in roomsIndex) and (i-1 not in facilitiesIndex)):	
			if (len(matrixWide[segment]) >= approxRowQty) and (segment < requiredSegments - 1):
				segment += 1
				matrixWide.append([])
			
		matrixWide[segment].append(_m)
		i += 1
			
	segmentLen = [len(x) for x in matrixWide]
	maxLen = max(segmentLen)
	
	emptyRow = bedsPerRow*[None]
	for i in range(len(matrixWide)):
		# Add empty rows to every segment of matrixWide if missing, to have same item numbers per segment (maxLen)
		for _missing in range(maxLen - segmentLen[i]):
			matrixWide[i].append(emptyRow)
	
	return matrixWide
	
	
	#matrixWide = "[ 
	#				[[*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*]],
	#				[[*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*]],
	#				[[*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*]],
	#					...
	#				[[*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*], [*,*,*,*,*]],
	# ] 
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('5matrixWide:',matrixWide[-2]))
	
	ExampleMatrix = """
[
	...
	
    [{"roomId": 76, "roomName": u"Room 9"}, None, None, None, None],
	[
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 189, "bedName": u"Bed 1", "bedNameNo": 1},
	    None,
	    None,
	    None,
	    None,
	],
	[{"facilityId": 14, "facilityName": u"Welcome Dorm"}, None, None, None, None],
	[{"roomId": 80, "roomName": u"Welcome Dorm"}, None, None, None, None],
	[
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 193, "bedName": u"Bed 1", "bedNameNo": 1},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 194, "bedName": u"Bed 2", "bedNameNo": 2},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 197, "bedName": u"Bed 3", "bedNameNo": 3},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 196, "bedName": u"Bed 4", "bedNameNo": 4},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 195, "bedName": u"Bed 5", "bedNameNo": 5},
	],
	[
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 200, "bedName": u"Bed 6", "bedNameNo": 6},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 198, "bedName": u"Bed 7", "bedNameNo": 7},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 199, "bedName": u"Bed 8", "bedNameNo": 8},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 201, "bedName": u"Bed 9", "bedNameNo": 9},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 202, "bedName": u"Bed 10", "bedNameNo": 10},
	],
	[
	    {"facilityId": 15, "facilityName": u"Women's Welcome Dorm"},
	    None,
	    None,
	    None,
	    None,
	],
	[{"roomId": 81, "roomName": u"Women's Welcome Dorm"}, None, None, None, None],
	[
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 203, "bedName": u"Bed 1", "bedNameNo": 1},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 204, "bedName": u"Bed 2", "bedNameNo": 2},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 205, "bedName": u"Bed 3", "bedNameNo": 3},
	    {"bedState": 0, "bedId": 206, "bedName": u"Bed 4", "bedNameNo": 4},
	    None,
	],
]
"""



	ExampleMatrixWide = """
[
...
	[
	...
		[None, None, None, None, None],
		[None, None, None, None, None],
		[None, None, None, None, None],
		[None, None, None, None, None],
		],
    [
		[{"roomId": 79, "roomName": u"Room 15"}, None, None, None, None],
		[
			{"bedState": 0, "bedId": 192, "bedName": u"Bed 1", "bedNameNo": 1},
			None,
			None,
			None,
			None,
		],

customMethods.name: getRoomSquared
customMethods.script:
listOut = []

	for j in range(colQty,len(listOfDict) + colQty, colQty):
		oneRow = listOfDict[j-colQty:j]
		
		# Add missing item. Fill to reach colQty number of items
		if len(oneRow) < colQty:
			oneRow += (colQty - len(oneRow))*[None]
		#yield oneRow
		listOut.append(oneRow)
	return listOut
	
	_ExampleListOfDict = """[{"a":1}, {"a":1},{"a":1},{"b":1}, {"b":1},{"b":1},{"b":1}]"""
	
	_ExampleReturnIfColQtyIs2 = """
	[
	[{'a': 1}, {'a': 1}]
	[{'a': 1}, {'b': 1}]
	[{'b': 1}, {'b': 1}]
	[{'b': 1}, None]
	]	
	"""

customMethods.name: getBedListDb
customMethods.script:
queryCoreBed = """
	DECLARE @OneDay date = ?  
		
	;WITH frb As (
	SELECT [Facility].[id] AS facilityId, [Room].[id] AS roomId, [Bed].[id] AS bedId
		,[Facility].[facilityName], [Room].[roomName], [Bed].[bedName]
		,ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1) bedNameNo 
	FROM [HMSOps].[lodging].[Bed]
		INNER JOIN [HMSOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
		INNER JOIN [HMSOps].[lodging].[Facility] ON [Room].[facilityId] = [Facility].[id]
	WHERE ([Facility].[timeRetired] is NULL 
		AND [Room].[timeRetired] is NULL
		AND [Bed].[timeRetired] is NULL) 
	)
	
	, r AS (
	SELECT DISTINCT [bedId]
	FROM [HMSOps].[lodging].[Reservation]  
	WHERE ([Reservation].[timeRetired] IS NULL
		AND [Reservation].[reservationStart] IS NOT NULL    
		AND CAST([Reservation].[reservationStart] AS date) <= @OneDay
		AND CAST(ISNULL([Reservation].[reservationEnd],@OneDay) AS date) >= @OneDay)
	)
	
	, o AS (
	SELECT DISTINCT [bedId] 
	FROM [HMSOps].[lodging].[BedLog]  
	WHERE ([eventStart] IS NOT NULL    
		AND CAST([eventStart] AS date) <= @OneDay
		AND CAST(ISNULL([eventEnd],@OneDay) AS date) >= @OneDay)
	)
	
	SELECT 
	frb.facilityId
	,frb.roomId
	,frb.bedId
	,frb.[facilityName]
	,frb.[roomName]
	,frb.[bedName]
	,frb.[bedNameNo] 
	,CASE WHEN o.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 2 ELSE (CASE WHEN r.bedId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS [bedState]
	FROM frb 
	LEFT JOIN r ON r.bedId = frb.bedId
	LEFT JOIN o ON o.bedId = frb.bedId
	WHERE frb.facilityId = ?
	
	ORDER BY facilityName,facilityId, roomName, roomId, bedNameNo
	"""
	#ORDER BY facilityName, roomName, bedNameNo
	
	resultBed = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryCoreBed,[dateIn, facilityId],'HMSOps') 	

	if resultBed.rowCount == 0:
		bedList = []	
	else:
		bedList = [dict(facilityId=x['facilityId'], roomId=x['roomID'], bedId=x['bedId'],facilityName=x['facilityName'], roomName =x['roomName'], bedNameNo = x['bedNameNo'],bedName = x['bedName'],bedState=x['bedState']) for x in system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultBed)]

	return bedList
	
	Example_bedList = """
[
	{
		"facilityId": 1,
		"bedState": 2,
		"bedId": 8,
		"roomId": 4,
		"roomName": u"Apartment 300",
		"bedName": u"Bed 1",
		"bedNameNo": 1,
		"facilityName": u"Apartments",
	},
	{
		"facilityId": 1,
		"bedState": 0,
		"bedId": 9,
		"roomId": 5,
		"roomName": u"Apartment 301",
		"bedName": u"Bed 1",
		"bedNameNo": 1,
		"facilityName": u"Apartments",
	},
	{
		"facilityId": 1,
		"bedState": 2,
		"bedId": 11,
		"roomId": 7,
		"roomName": u"Apartment 302",
		"bedName": u"Bed 1",
		"bedNameNo": 1,
		"facilityName": u"Apartments",
	},
...	
]
	"""

customMethods.name: getDataPropsInit
customMethods.script:
bedsPerRow = len(matrixWide[0][0])
	
	segmentCount = len(matrixWide)
	rowCount = len(matrixWide[0])
	colNames = ['x{}'.format(i) for i in range(segmentCount)]

	data0 = []
	i = 0
	for rowIndex in range(rowCount):
		auxDict0 = {}
		for segIndex in range(segmentCount):
			auxDict0[colNames[segIndex]] = (bedsPerRow)*[None] 
			i+=1

		data0.append(auxDict0)
	return data0

customMethods.name: getDataProps
customMethods.script:
controlData = self.getChild("Table").props.data
	
	segmentCount = len(matrixWide)
	rowCount = len(matrixWide[0])
	colNames = ['x{}'.format(i) for i in range(segmentCount)]
	#ystem.perspective.print(("colNames",colNames, rowCount ))
	data = []
	i = 0
	for rowIndex in range(rowCount):
		auxDict = {}
		for segIndex in range(segmentCount):
			col = colNames[segIndex]
			auxDict[colNames[segIndex]] = matrixWide[segIndex][rowIndex]
			i+=1
		
		
		data.append(auxDict)
		#yield auxDict
	system.perspective.print(('data:',data))
	return data

customMethods.name: setDataProps
customMethods.script:
tbl = self.getChild("Table")
	
	
	segmentCount = len(matrixWide)
	rowCount = len(matrixWide[0])
	colNames = ['x{}'.format(i) for i in range(segmentCount)]
	#ystem.perspective.print(("colNames",colNames, rowCount ))
	data = []

	for rowIndex in range(rowCount):
		auxDict = {}
		for segIndex in range(segmentCount):
			col = colNames[segIndex]
			tbl.props.data[rowIndex][col] = matrixWide[segIndex][rowIndex]

customMethods.name: correctRooms
customMethods.script:
def getFirstDigit(sometext):
		if not(sometext) or not(isinstance(sometext,basestring)):
			return -1
		
		d = -1	
		for s in unicode.split(sometext):
			if s.isdigit():
				d = int(s)
				break
		return d
	
	for item in bedList:
		facilityName = item.get('facilityName')
		
		if facilityName and facilityName in correctionList:
			# Following assignment order is important
			item['bedName'] = item['roomName']
			item['bedNameNo'] = getFirstDigit(item['bedName'])
			item['roomName'] = item['facilityName']
			item['roomId'] = 0
			
	return bedList

	facilityId = payload['facilityId']

	try:
		tmp = long(facilityId)
	except:

	from java.util import Date 
	
	if not(isinstance(dateIn, Date)) or not(tmp):
		return

	self.setTableData(dateIn, facilityId)
